website_summaries.verdict: Offers firm, smooth compression that a square ice pack can't.
pros: Stainless roller ball stays ice cold
Soft rubber handle is comfortable and ergonomic
Ice pack type therapy plus massaging relief
Durable TPE and stainless steel components
Use with shoulder and rotator cuff pain, carpal tunnel, tennis elbow, and plantar fasciitis

customer_reviews.title: Good but leaked in a less than a month
customer_reviews.text: At first, it works great! Targeted sore muscles and easily portable. I really liked it was getting ready to order a second one. Then the fluid started leaking in less than a month of use and the fluid smelled bad and highly absorbed through skin which is concerning. Tried contacting seller directly but no response back from seller. Too bad. Good potential.
customer_reviews.author: hola

customer_reviews.title: Leaky :/
customer_reviews.text: Leaks fluid :( Had it for about a month and it started leaking out fluid from inside. The fluid smells awful like alcohol and nail polish remover combined. Very disappointed of the fluid leaking on my clothes and skin. I found a way to drain the liquid inside by popping off the ball from the stick and unscrewing the screw attached to the ball. Other than the leaking, this thing is very good when you have sore muscles
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: It leaks
customer_reviews.text: This thing was awesome for like the first 10mins then it started leaking the that is inside the ball. It this thing wouldnt leak it would be the best recovery ball.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy T.

customer_reviews.title: BOTH my rollers leaked whatever fluid is inside the ball
customer_reviews.text: First one I received leaked after I left in freezer for 4 hours - thought maybe it was a fluke. Reordered, and the second also leaks! Was a great idea but the leaking of whatever fluid is inside the ball is a dealbreaker. Very disappointed. I would not buy, I am just going to get a lacrosse ball.
customer_reviews.author: norm2004

customer_reviews.title: Fluid leaks out :(
customer_reviews.text: I had one for about a year and then it started leaking. Had this one about a month and the same thing happened! It's a great product if the fluid wouldn't come out! We're still using it but we have to put an old towel down so that it will absorb the fluid that's coming out. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: LouAnn

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for about six months. Now it has a huge split in the metal and all the fluid leaked out. I've never abused this in any way that could have caused such to happen. I've very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: A.M.M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My hands tend to cramp up quickly, whenever I try to massage my husbands back, but this is easy enough to roll over all his muscles and joints and is easier on my fingers too! This product is great because you can even throw it into the freezer and the water inside the metal ball with help keep the roller cold for soar muscles. The only issue is, it is a bit weird to get used to and hard to control properly. It is lightweight though and a nice gift for anyone with tight muscles
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cold Roller
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who plays college basketball to use in his apartment, as needed. He says it is really easy to use and provides almost instant relief. He also prefers this to actual ice because this doesn't melt and make a mess, plus it provides a massage to the muscles while cooling them. Best of all, he can use this any time of the day or night and doesn't have to wait for a trainer. Even when not frozen, this still provides cooling relief.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Roller
customer_reviews.text: The roller started leaking for no reason during use. Want to return it or get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: David Minich

customer_reviews.title: Best massager
customer_reviews.text: This has good weight to it but not heavy and compact. It rolls easily and the weight feels good as it rolls. This is the best massager I've had and works good for rolling out knots. There is fluid in the ball so you could hear it splashing when rolling vigorously. Not an issue for me just thought I'd mention.
customer_reviews.author: Spartacus

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon delivery.. useless and fragile!
customer_reviews.text: Item came in a very lightly packaged envelope with minimal wrapping, thus resulting in the roller to break possibly. Upon opening the package, the ball was detached from the handle itself and scratched significantly, thus making the entire product useless. I basically have a metal ball at this point without a handle, impossible to use as a handheld roller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too cold
customer_reviews.text: I didn't investigate this well enough before purchasing. I saw it in REI and thought it felt amazing. Better price on Amazon. Pros: It can feel amazing and is easy to use. Cons: It is crazy cold. I live in Colorado and I have never put it in the freezer (I hadn't realized that was the selling point here....) and even "room temp" it is wayyyy to cold to use. Maybe in the summer... outside... it'll get some use?
customer_reviews.author: QuixoticOther

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product! I have put it in the freezer
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have had this right after my brain & neck surgery. Would have been a really headache saver. It is a great product! I have put it in the freezer, I find this is to cold for me. So I will put it in the refrigerator if I need it cold. Most of the time it is in my purse and I can use it anywhere. The steel roller is always cool on my head, neck or temples!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Good roller, really cold metal ball.
customer_reviews.text: This roller is fantastic, I have yet to freeze it as the rolling ball is really cold. I don’t even think freezing it is necessary as the steel ball feels super cold sitting in room temperatures. The mechanics of the roller are great, and it definitely massages well, works best if someone else is doing the rolling though, as the handle is super short.
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and cool
customer_reviews.text: Got this for the hubby since he always has sore muscles after workouts. He already has one of the regular ball rollers and it works, but the handle on this one is so much better and more ergonimic. He also loves the cold roller, but since its so cold has to use it over a shirt instead on bare skin like the non-cold ones. Definitely an upgrade from the basic one we had before.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out - This Leaks a Weird Gray Liquid
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this. It feels really nice to use it, but it continuously leaks a grey liquid. It's really gross.
customer_reviews.author: J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It broke...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a few weeks and then started leaking some weird smelling liquid. I had hoped it would last longer under normal use.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Gies

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: The Polar Roller is a great product and perfect for injuries, sore muscles and aching feet. The rolling ball shape is able to get in to all areas, and the ergonomic handle make it perfect for working on yourself or others. The ball gets cold very quickly and stays cold quite awhile. I would highly recommend this product, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works better then ice pack
customer_reviews.text: Stays good and good for muscle strains in neck back etc. Got two one for me and one for my Dad who had knee replacement and has leg and knee pain . Easy and more effective then ice pack for aches
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Plutschack

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I received this product last night and used it for the first time tonight. I am dissapointed. It is leaking the fluid all over me
customer_reviews.author: .....CAB

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The handle was too short, the unit is top heavy, the ball doesn't roll- it slides, and very awkward to use. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Smiling Amers

customer_reviews.title: Product leaks
customer_reviews.text: Product started leaking out of the ball and all over onto me during the second time I used it.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Carmoney

customer_reviews.title: Leaked out fluid all over
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well but started leaking the fluid it contains. It’s not tossed around or anything, just randomly started leaking. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rylan

customer_reviews.title: Leaks fliud
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 works pretty good but both are leaking the fluid inside roller ball, they allowed me to return 1 and replaced it but now I can't get the other one replaced. Waiting for the replacement one to fail now....
customer_reviews.author: John Bierworth

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and really works
customer_reviews.text: Hit the back of my head in a fall, it was very handy to roll the back of my head and neck. My massage therapist had one, so I ordered my own.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J. Walker

customer_reviews.title: I don’t recommend this product do to it leaks after 3 days of supper light use.
customer_reviews.text: Opened it up tried it. Put it into the fridge to cool it down. Pulled it out and tried it on my wife. It started leaking on my wife’s white shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love and have 3!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little roller ... I have shin splints and tennis elbow. I have one at work and two at home. Thank goodness no problem with leaking and have had them for several months. Use on my eyes to reduce puffiness too! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Spartan mom 2012

customer_reviews.title: Love this product works excellent on my back and neck and shoulders
customer_reviews.text: Can’t say enough about how good this is the only way they could make it better would be if they had three rollers on it instead of one with a longer handle !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jonathan sneed

customer_reviews.title: Great thing to pop out of the freezer when needed....
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of use...and the nice coldness of it...and how easy it is to use on any needed part of the body...I have high hopes for this...
customer_reviews.author: Philomena

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice after a few uses it started dripping a little
customer_reviews.author: Deitre Malory

customer_reviews.title: Slow to refreeze
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, however it needs more than four hours to really get refrozen, if icing is needed multiple times a day. It will get cold and give a massage, I just wished it was as good after two hours in the freezer as it is twelve hours in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Daby

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed using the Polar Roller, it is especially nice for the neck and upper shoulders where trying to place an ice pack in inconvenient and cumbersome. Plus you can apply as much or as little pressure as you desire.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great massaging product
customer_reviews.text: I originally saw this in a REI store and knew i had to pick one up online. Yes you can put it in the freezer but it's not needed. The liquid in the ball will stay cold with just ambient room temperature. The ball rolls seamlessly and this is the best massage rolling product I've found on amazon to date. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Krauchick

customer_reviews.title: It works fine for me even if you don't freeze it
customer_reviews.text: It works fine for me even if you don't freeze it, but when muscles are really tight the coldness helps. It's still hard to roll the top of the shoulders by myself, but this helps.
customer_reviews.author: cjs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. I leave it in the frezzer and use it when my knees hurt
customer_reviews.author: weaponx

customer_reviews.title: Leaky joints
customer_reviews.text: My polar roller started leaking during the first use. I tried freezing it and trying again in the hopes i could a few minutes of use out of it but again it leaked all over my shirt and neck. The idea is great, and i really do wish the product worked.
customer_reviews.author: Tais

customer_reviews.title: Great for runners
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! Great for sore muscles or for a quick massage.
customer_reviews.author: killaton

customer_reviews.title: Cold but not long
customer_reviews.text: Doesent do much for me . It’s not long enough to reach all of my traps, so I don’t get relief. It keeps very cold due to the liquid inside. I don’t feel i can apply the pressure I need. 👎🏼
customer_reviews.author: Ladyhero78

customer_reviews.title: So cold but so good!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to work out knots in your muscles...... this will do it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly Jenks

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Best massager I’ve ever purchased! No regrets. This feels so good and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: She says it feels amazing. Can be used at room temperature or frozen if you like it cold. A great way to give a shoulder massage.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C Exline

customer_reviews.title: it works great and relaxes my muscles
customer_reviews.text: This works really well without freezing it. When it's cold, it tightens my muscles and defeats the purpose. When I use it at room temp, it works great and relaxes my muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Grad Student

customer_reviews.title: Must Have Massage Tool
customer_reviews.text: This massage roller has a nice weight to it. I especially appreciate its cool, soothing capabilities when I experience my headaches. It feels so good and makes the day more tolerable. I don't need to call in to work. It's easy to use independently. Maybe a longer handle attachment will become available to get those hard-to-reach spots.
customer_reviews.author: TT

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly, a gift for my gf, hope ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, a gift for my gf, hope she likes it, she has a stiff back and gets warm fast, so I thought this would help.
customer_reviews.author: incognito

customer_reviews.title: A friend recommended this to me and I am so glad I ...
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommended this to me and I am so glad I bought it. Makes those nights of icing my muscles so much easier and less wet. Also I can apply more pressure. I definitely guarantee this.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Buy this. Just do it. It’ll change your ...
customer_reviews.text: Buy this. Just do it. It’ll change your life. No more awkward massages or prickly back Scratches. Just smooth, methodical compression rolls.
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: This product works!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this massage polar roller. Says it does more to ease the pain and stiffness in her neck than all the doctor and massage therapy visit she has been to.

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect if you have someone to help get knots out ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had this when struggling with shin splints! It's perfect if you have someone to help get knots out of your back and is great on your legs after a run.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream put it in the freezer then use

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great massage roller to get out those hard to reach knots

customer_reviews.title: Cools down quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I slammed my thumb as I was rushing around to leave and grabbed this from my freezer on the way out the door. Once it "warmed up" I was able to put it in a cup of ice and spin it around to make it super cold again!

customer_reviews.title: This product would be perfect if the ball was more securely held in position ...
customer_reviews.text: This product would be perfect if the ball was more securely held in position when attached to the handle. The issue is entirely dependent on the amount of pressure you apply. The more pressure, the more likely the ball is to shoot out of the handle. Otherwise it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!!! The cold roller makes it so easy to glide on my sore knee. It was recommended by my massage therapist. I leave it in my freezer and use it when my knee pain flares up. I might buy another as a back up!!!

customer_reviews.text: Stays cold a long time. Feels great rolling on my sore legs!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for knots

customer_reviews.text: I love this. It helps get knots out of my muscles without much pain. It does stay cold for awhile, but it's only ice-pack cold for about 5 minutes. The body warms it up.

customer_reviews.title: Warning! Chemical Leak

customer_reviews.text: Worked great in the beginning but cracked after my kid dropped it. It was only like a foot off the ground. Don't have much hope for getting it replaced after reading other reviews :(

customer_reviews.title: Use it!

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I just had BOTH knees replaced and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I just had BOTH knees replaced and swelling is an ongoing fight which is the source of great pain...ice packs are so miserable. This is amazing. And my hubby has a stiff and sore neck and it works great for that. I am sure we will use this for years to come.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Polar Perfection.......
customer_reviews.text: Love it ! I know it is supposed to relieve sore muscles, but I use it first thing in the morning on my face and around my eyes ....to reduce puffiness. It rolls easily around the eye area and feels wonderful. The other day it was so hot out. When I came home, I just sat down and rolled it all over my face and neck.......so refreshing,,,,,, So if I ever have a sore muscle, I am sure it will awesome as well.
customer_reviews.author: Caja

customer_reviews.title: and the textured andle makes it easy to get at and apply pressure and cold in ...
customer_reviews.text: Stays cold for a long time, and the textured andle makes it easy to get at and apply pressure and cold in places where larger rollers can't. Sometimes I wish the surface were not as smooth and offered some knarly bumps to break up and stimulate blood flow in the areas, but obviously I knew that wasn't the case when I bought it, so I don't at all hold it against the product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Icy awesomeness.

Even without the thermal stuff, it would make a good muscle roller. Pro Tip: Keep it in a bag since it's coming in contact with skin, and sitting among the food in the freezer.

product_meta.title: GoFit Massage Polar Roller - Cold Rolling Ball
feature_bullets: POLAR: The GoFit Massage Polar Roller uses targeted cold rolling massage therapy to help reduce inflammation and muscle pain! The included Owner’s Manual will help guide you with massage instructions.
PORTABLE: The GoFit Massage Polar Roller stays ice cold for an extended period of time and features a non-freezing alcohol based liquid, making it totally convenient and portable!
SLEEVE: The Massage Polar Roller features a detachable rubber sleeve that can be removed prior to freezing so your hands stay toasty warm while gripping the ergonomic handle!
RELIEF: The GoFit Massage Polar Roller is effective in helping with pain and inflammation related to shoulder and rotator cuff pain, Carpal Tunnel, Tennis Elbow, Plantar Fasciitis, and much more!
USE: Simply place the high quality stainless steel Massage Polar Roller into the freezer between uses for active, cold-therapy relief with no wet ice-pack mess!
